attributes.action: stop tattoo discrimination within the workplace and/ or whilst applying for jobs
attributes.additional_details: hello everybody i am an 19 year old student studying media and i am trying to raise awareness that tattoo discrimination is wrong to me personally its the same as race discrimination because everyone has different faiths, beliefs and ideas within the work place.I would like people who think that you should not be refused a job because you have tattoos on you hands,neck and face as long as these tattoos are not racist or offensive to any religious group or ethnic background  please sign this petition to raise awareness and have tattoo discrimination removed from employment prospects within the U.K.
